job5.title: Software developer
job5.description: After my studies, I joined novomind AG as a full-stack developer and was responsible for the Jungheinrich professional store. Even though I initially worked a lot on the JAVA backend, my work quickly shifted to the frontend and I was able to further expand my skills there, getting to know technologies such as jQuery, Typescript and Angular.js during this time. In 2020, I then moved to the novomind core team to lead the new development of our store admin interface as a frontend architect. We used the latest technologies such as GraphQL and Vue.js (first version 2, then 3).
